body:
Hi Randolph,


You can convert it to MGF and from there to VRML (Inventor 2.0) format:


	rad2mgf input files ... | mgf2inv > combined.inv


You can build these tools in ray/src/cv/mgflib if you haven't done so  
already.  Textures don't come through, sadly.


Best,
-Greg
___
